participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Shy but friendly, enjoys deep conversations and sharing interests.
participant_1.background: I am not the best at keeping up with my family because I often do not watch the news or television, and I can be shy at times. Helping people and trying new things are two of my favorite things to do. I want a home with a gym and a racquetball court so I can stay in shape and enjoy my favorite sport. I love to watch my daughters dance ballet. my car broke down last week.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and creative, loves music and enjoys sharing his passions with others.
participant_2.background: I sometimes play the drums for hours on end, which is not very productive. I have to lose weight so I can ride my horses again. I am a healthy person who enjoys cooking and keeping my hair natural. my favorite singer is justin timberlike. my father was an author.

content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of Justin Timberlake!
Hey! Me too! What's your favorite song?
That's a tough one, but it's probably "Cry Me a River."
I love that one too! I also like "Suit & Tie."
Those are both great songs! What other artists do you like?
I like a lot of different music, but I'm also a big fan of Ed Sheeran.
I love Ed Sheeran too! He's so talented.
Yeah, he's amazing! I'm really excited for his new album.
Me too! I've heard good things about it.
I think it's going to be his best album yet.
I hope so! I'm definitely going to check it out.
You should! I'm sure you'll love it.
Great! I'm glad we found something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
Well, it was nice talking to you. I hope you have a great day!
You too! It was nice talking to you too.
